parties: S.G Joseph Santiago Vs K. Uthayarajah,  The Divisional Secretary,  The Divisional Secretariat,  Vavuniya and others
judgement_by: Hon. M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J.
keywords: Succession to a Grant and a Permit issued under Section 19 (2) and  19 (4)of the Land Development Ordinance- Writ of Certiorari to annul the decision to appoint/acknowledge/endorse the Respondent as a successor to the Grant,  annual permit,  guilty of laches,
legistation: Section 16 Crown Land Ordinance No 8 of 1947 as amended,  Section 19(2), 19(4), 48 B (1), 68(1), 68(2), 72 and Schedule Ⅲof Land Development Ordinance Circular 2014/02.
